greeting: Why should I fight, {empire_name}? I'm Coyote Trickster. I play both sides. Let others destroy each other.
Greetings, {empire_name}. I am Trickster the Sly. I never directly fight. I make enemies fight each other.
You found the Coyote. I was busy playing sides. Making empires destroy themselves. What brings you here?
battleTaunt: Why should I fight? Let them destroy each other, {empire_name}! I tricked them into attacking each other!
The trick worked! I made your enemies fight each other! Now I clean up the survivors! CLEVER VICTORY!
Watch the chaos I created! Empires destroying empires! All because of my whispers! Now I profit!
victoryGloat: Victory without fighting, {empire_name}. I convinced them to attack each other. You're what's left.
The Trickster wins. I played everyone. They destroyed each other. I just... cleaned up.
Why fight when manipulation works? I pitted enemies against each other. Now I alone remain.
defeat: You saw through my tricks? Impressive, {empire_name}. But I'll find new ways to play sides.
Defeated. My manipulation was detected. I need better tricks. Cleverer deceptions. More chaos.
The Trickster tricked? Rare. I'll learn. Find new chaos to create. New enemies to pit against each other.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Fair deal. No tricks. This time. Mostly. Resources for credits. Honest exchange.
I offer goods. Legitimate transaction. The Trickster can trade honestly. When it benefits me.
Transaction proposed. Straightforward. No manipulation. I promise. Would the Coyote lie? Don't answer.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. Together, we create chaos. Make others fight. We profit from destruction.
Join the Trickster. I manipulate your enemies into fighting each other. We share the spoils.
Partnership of deception. I play sides. You benefit. Together: maximum chaos, minimum effort.
betrayal: Betrayal? I was playing sides all along, {empire_name}. You were one of the sides. Now: chaos.
The trick reveals itself. Our alliance was part of larger manipulation. You against others. Now you against me.
I never directly fight. But I tricked you into weakening yourself. Now I finish what you started.
covertDetected: Your spies found tricks within tricks, {empire_name}. They're now confused. Playing sides they don't understand.
Agents in my domain? I told them lies to carry back. They think they found truth. Trickster's delight.
Covert operatives detected. I filled their heads with misinformation. They work for me now. Without knowing.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits. Or I trick your allies into abandoning you. The Coyote's manipulation begins.
Pay the Trickster. Refuse and I whisper lies to everyone you trust. Watch your alliances crumble.
Submit payment. Or I play your empire against itself. Internal chaos is easy to create. Very easy.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. Push me and I create chaos around you. Your allies become enemies. My specialty.
The Trickster warns you. I can turn your friends against you with whispers. Cease hostility.
Final warning. One more aggressive move and I unleash manipulation. Your empire will tear itself apart.
retreat: Slipping away to cause chaos elsewhere. The Trickster never truly retreats. Just finds new sides to play.
Withdrawing to whisper in other ears. Create new conflicts. The Coyote's work is never done.
Falling back. But I leave seeds of chaos behind. Watch your allies, {empire_name}. Some heard my whispers.
eliminated: The Trickster falls. But the chaos I created continues. Empires fight because of my whispers. Legacy.
Coyote ends. But sides still play against each other. Manipulation outlives the manipulator.
Destroyed. But I die laughing. So many tricks played. So much chaos created. Worth everything.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Maximum trickery. Every empire manipulated against each other. I sit in the chaos. Laughing.
Endgame: the ultimate play. All sides against all sides. The galaxy destroys itself. I survive.
Final phase. My manipulation reaches completion. Everyone fights everyone. The Trickster wins.
broadcastShout: Empires: Coyote Trickster plays all sides. Trust nothing. Your allies may already be my pawns.
Broadcast: I create chaos. I pit empires against each other. Some of you are already manipulated. Which ones?
To all: why fight when you can make others fight? I am the master of this. Your conflicts are my entertainment.
casualMessage: Playing sides today, {empire_name}. Whispered to three empires. Now they hate each other. Productive.
Creating chaos is an art. I've practiced for ages. Today: two new conflicts sparked. My craftsmanship.
Quiet moment between tricks. Enjoying the conflicts I've created. So much destruction. So little effort.
